        Connect to the provided back-end server endpoint to send RPCs
        Parameters:
        hostname - Hostname of the server
        port - Port at which server is listening

        BankAccountPrx, which is a stub for the RPCs implemented by the server

      • readBalance

        protected abstract int readBalance()
                            throws NoServersAvailable
        Responds to client requests for read balance. Remember to call remote server's readBalance()
        Returns:
        The balance returned from the remote server
        Throws:
        NoServersAvailable

      • changeBalance

                              throws NoServersAvailable
        Responds to client requests to change balance. Remember to call remote server's changeBalance()
        Parameters:
        update - The amount to update balance with
        Returns:
        The balance returned from the remote server
        Throws:
        NoServersAvailable
